Text.Language: Tenouwst m~Viwt n~a~gayoc: nem pefs/ri I/#c# P,#c#: nem Pipneuma m~parakl/ton: ]t~riac e#y#u# n~o~mooucioc.
We worship the good Father, and His Son Jesus Christ, and the Spirit of comfort, the Holy and co-essential Trinity.
نسجد للآب الصالح مع إبنه يسوع المسيح والروح المعزى الثالوث الأقدس المساوى.
